Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: Bokura no Chiisagoto ni (Our Last Meeting) (1979) which focuses on the poet's Chicago days as compared to Chiisagoto no Ato ni Otsu (Homecoming) (1999), which posits his return back to Japan
